metadata.description: The name of the function app to create. Must be globally unique.
The language runtime of the function app.
Multi-tenant App Registration (Service Principal) Client ID
Multi-tenant App Registration (Service Principal) Client Secret
Enable system-assigned managed identity for the function app
Value for the 'Project' tag required by Azure Policy
Value for the 'CreatedBy' tag required by Azure Policy
Value for the 'DeleteAt' tag required by Azure Policy (e.g., '2025-12-31' or 'Never')
The URL of the GitHub repository for source control configuration
The branch of the GitHub repository to use
Enable GitHub source control integration (requires GitHub token)

publishProfileInstructions.value: [concat('To get the publish profile for GitHub Actions, run: az functionapp deployment list-publishing-profiles --resource-group ', resourceGroup().name, ' --name ', variables('functionAppName'), ' --xml')]

value.instructions: Configure these values as GitHub secrets. See AUTOMATED_DEPLOYMENT.md for detailed setup instructions.
